backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining SurgeryCase, Task, TaskOptions, UserProfile, and OpenAIConfig types with CRUD operations for cases and user profiles, plus authorization mixins for admin/user permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: microphone button UI placement, Web Speech API voice recording toggle, and automatic speech-to-text transcription into the Quick Fill input box.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, hooks, types, validation, search, and CSV import/export functionality with detailed descriptions of case management, task tracking, and voice recording features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes defining colors for background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, borders, charts, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA manifest, favicon links, theme color meta tags, and Apple mobile web app configuration for the SurgiPaw application.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, display mode, theme colors, and start URL for SurgiPaw veterinary surgery case management application.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy for static assets, precaching app shell on install, cleaning old caches on activate, and skipping caching for Internet Identity and API calls.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component with Internet Identity authentication, view routing between dashboard/cases/settings, profile setup modal, navigation buttons, and forced light theme with dark class prevention.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Login/logout button component using Internet Identity with query cache clearing on logout, error handling for duplicate authentication, and primary/outline button styling based on auth state.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal dialog for new users to enter their name during initial profile setup, with form validation and mutation handling via useSaveCallerUserProfile hook.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Defines checklist items (discharge notes, labs, imaging, etc.) with configuration for task selection/completion fields, default values, colors, and utility functions for counting and filtering tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Displays a surgery case card with editable notes, task checklist with color-coded badges, edit/delete actions, and inline task completion toggling with optimistic updates.

Dialog for creating/editing surgery cases with fields for patient info, AI-powered structured text parsing, speech recognition support, MRN-based case lookup for prefilling, and task checklist editor.

Main view component that displays filtered, sorted, and searchable list of surgery cases with controls for species/task filtering, CSV import/export, and handles case selection with scroll-to-highlight behavior.
Search input component with search icon and clear button for filtering cases by any field.
Dropdown select component for choosing case sort order using predefined sort options from the sorting module.
Popover filter component with checkboxes for selecting species to filter cases, persists selections to session storage, and shows active filter count badge.
A popover filter component that allows users to filter cases by task types and completion status, persisting selections to session storage.
A checklist component that displays task items with checkboxes, supporting both creation mode (selecting tasks) and completion mode (marking tasks complete), with color-coded borders.
A panel component providing CSV export and import functionality for surgery cases, with progress tracking, error handling, and support for both creating new cases and updating existing ones.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: A date input component with both manual text entry (MM/DD/YYYY format with auto-formatting) and calendar picker, supporting auto-advance on completion and validation.
Core CSV import/export logic that converts surgery cases to/from CSV format, handles parsing, validation, and matching with existing cases by medical record number.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines the CSV schema with 17 columns for surgery case data, including headers, validation constants, and documentation for expected formats and field mappings.
frontend/src/features/cases/filtering.ts: Provides filtering functions for surgery cases by species, task types, task completion status, and whether all tasks are completed or not.
frontend/src/features/cases/hooks/useSpe: React hook that wraps the browser's Web Speech Recognition API to provide voice-to-text transcription with error handling and browser compatibility checks.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Preprocesses raw OCR text by normalizing whitespace, correcting common character recognition errors (O/0, I/1/l confusion), and removing artifacts; serves as fallback for cleaning semi-structured AI responses.

Parses label:value formatted text to extract case information fields (MRN, owner, pet name, dates, species, sex, breed, complaint) into a CaseFormData object; used as fallback for AI responses and Quick Fill feature.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/generate: Generates a printable PDF report of surgery cases with remaining tasks using browser's native print functionality via a hidden iframe, without external dependencies.
Generates and downloads a CSV report of all surgery cases including their details and remaining tasks, with proper CSV field escaping.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/pdfForma: Provides formatting utilities for PDF display: converts Time (bigint nanoseconds) to MM/DD/YYYY strings, Species/Sex enums to readable text, and formats task lists.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/reportFo: Provides formatting utilities for CSV reports: converts Time (bigint nanoseconds) to MM/DD/YYYY strings and Species/Sex enums to readable text.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Implements case search functionality that filters surgery cases by matching query strings against basic fields (MRN, pet name, owner, species, breed, sex, complaint, notes) and incomplete checklist tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/services/aiI: Empty file, likely a placeholder for future AI image analysis service implementation.
frontend/src/features/cases/sorting.ts: Provides sorting functionality for surgery cases with options for arrival date (newest/oldest) and open task count (most/fewest), using checklist item counts for task-based sorting.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types and constants for case forms, including species options (canine, feline, other), sex options (male, female, neutered/spayed variants), and the CaseFormData interface.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Contains validation and parsing functions for case form fields including required field validation, species/sex parsing with flexible string matching, boolean parsing, and date validation with string parsing support.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Main dashboard component that displays a filterable, searchable, and sortable list of surgery cases with task badges, species indicators, and navigation to individual cases; includes PDF generation and task filtering capabilities.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/op: Utility functions for extracting open tasks from surgery cases and calculating total open task counts across multiple cases using checklist item data.
frontend/src/features/settings/component: Settings page component for configuring OpenAI API key with validation status display, secure input field with show/hide toggle, and save functionality using React Query mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance with authentication, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Custom React hook that debounces a changing value with configurable delay (default 500ms) using setTimeout and cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login status, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options for ICP authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for surgery case CRUD operations (getAllCases, getCaseByMedicalRecordNumber, createCase, updateCase) and user profile management, using the actor from useActor hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a light blue color scheme using OKLCH color space, including specialized colors for patient names, species fields, presenting complaints, and notes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function that combines clsx and tailwind-merge to merge Tailwind CSS class names intelligently.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/types/jspdf-autotable.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for jspdf-autotable module.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for jspdf module.
frontend/src/types/tesseract.d.ts: TypeScript type definitions for Tesseract.js OCR library, including Worker interface, recognition options, result structures, and enums for page segmentation modes and OCR engine modes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color tokens using OKLCH color space, border radius variables, Inter font family, and including animate and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for SurgiPaw application tracking features including authentication, project restoration from version 67, and voice recording for Quick Fill functionality using Web Speech API.
